Comments_List: Learned what elements/attributes make for a good UI.

A large part of the course has nothing to do with graphical user interface. The first part of the semester was spent learning about general architectural designs. First few assignments also do not relate to user interface at all. I am confused why this course is in the computer science department.
Yes, good course to learn UI fundamentals.
No, this course does not provide much useful information for anyone who wants to learn about user interface design.
